软件安装与升级

by Air

February 26, 2012
in Old blogs

Migarated from here at ‘2016-07-08 18:28:43’.

好久没开ubuntu～今天一开，蹦出57个升级项目，可是upgrade

manager把包都下下来了，安装的时候却一直出错。只好用指令试试，Ctrl+Alt+T打开terminal:

sudo apt-get update;

sudo apt-get upgrade;

升级了46个，从upgrade manager里看还剩11个没装上，报错：

Unpacking sysvutils (from

…/sysvutils_2.86.ds1-14.1ubuntu45.1_i386.deb) …

dpkg: error processing

/var/cache/apt/archives/sysvutils_2.86.ds1-14.1ubuntu45.1_i386.deb

(–unpack):

 trying to overwrite

‘/usr/share/man/man1/mesg.1.gz’, which is also in package

sysvinit-utils 2.88dsf-13.10ubuntu4.1

No apport report written because MaxReports is reached

already

Processing triggers for man-db …

Errors were encountered while processing:

 /var/cache/apt/archives/sysvutils_2.86.ds1-14.1ubuntu45.1_i386.deb

Error in function: 

SystemError: E:Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code

(1)

把/etc/apt/sources.list改了源，更不全了～

用manager挨个装也不行，用terminal挨个装，居然可以了，只是装到最后一个”sysvutils“，又出现上面错误了～

倒是找到几个比较有用的教ubuntu系统设置的网站：

http://wiki.ubuntu.org.cn/UbuntuSkills

http://wiki.ubuntu.org.cn/快速设置指南/DapperDrake#.E4.BF.AE.E6.94.B9.E6.BA.90.E5.B9.B6.E6.9B.B4.E6.96.B0.E5.8D.87.E7.BA.A7Ubuntu
